      • canSeeDraftVersion

        public boolean canSeeDraftVersion​(Context context,
                                  VersionHistory versionHistory)
                           throws SQLException
        Description copied from interface: VersionHistoryService
        This method has a scope to verify if the logged user has permission to see the attribute 'draftVersion' of the latest version.
        Specified by:
        canSeeDraftVersion in interface VersionHistoryService
        Parameters:
        context - DSpace context object
        versionHistory - Version history object
        Returns:
        return true if the logged user has permission to see the attribute 'draftVersion' of the latest version, otherwise false
        Throws:
        SQLException - If database error
